pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data for Mathematical Modeling and Applied Calculus // Contains the data sets for the first and second editions of the textbook "Mathematical Modeling and Applied Calculus" by Joel Kilty and Alex M. McAllister. The first edition of the book was published by Oxford University Press in 2018 with ISBN-13: 978-019882472. The second edition is expected to be published in January 2027.
